item.title: Travel and Read
item.description: See the source code of this page if you are interested. 微信公众号排版工具。问题或建议，请小红书私信/公众号留言。孟小柒同学seven 2024年回家记 You can either travel or read,but either your body or soul must be on the way. 要么读书，要么旅行，身体和灵魂，必须有一个在路上。 -《罗马假日》

item.title: Movies: Homeless to Harvard: The Liz Murray Story
item.description: See the source code of this page if you are interested. 微信公众号排版工具。问题或建议，请公众号留言。孟小柒同学 Intro : Liz (Thora Birch) was born in a slum in the United States and began to suffer from the devastation of the family since she was a child, her parents were drinking and taking drugs, and her mother suffered from schizophrenia. Poor Liz needs to go out to beg, wander the corners of the city, and the misery of life seems endless.
